name: elm-oauth-middleware
description: A minimal example of using elm-web-server

scripts.build: cp src/index.js build/index.js && cp ews/index.js build/ews.js && elm-make src/Main.elm --output build/elm.js
scripts.setup: rm -rf build elm-stuff node_modules && npm i -y && elm-package install -y && mkdir build && npm run build

author: Bill St. Clair <billstclair@gmail.com
